content:
Hmm, looks like something's wrong with GitHub :wink::

image.png

(https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/80165#issuecomment-777057995)
Oh, nm, reloaded and it's the same
Yeah, probably there's some glitch on their end.
Now it shows 5 :+1: but still only djc :shrug:
I've had to react and unreact to get any names to show up today :shrug:

scottmcm said:

I've had to react and unreact to get any names to show up today :shrug:

I don't understand what "react and unreact" means, but I'd like to do it, too.
Yesterday I was confused because I have replaced a label on an issue but the message was still "apiraino set XXX label 4 days ago"

(for reference, the event I am referring to is here)

What I mean is that if I highlighted a :hearts:, it didn't show had put it there. But if I clicked it to add me, then clicked it again to remove myself, then it showed the list of names in the hover. (So I don't think it'll help if you're having tag trouble.)
ah ok now I got it: react as in "adding an emoji reaction". For some reason I was lost in my thoughts and thought about React as in "javascript React" :laughing:
